definition-item.definition-title: Thermal insulation in general

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Thermal insulation for pipes or hoses or pipe cover elements, or in general, e.g. when no other special application of the insulation is given.
Specific materials or specific uses for thermal insulation are classified in the specific fields for the material or use (e.g. fridges, building panels or motor compartments).
Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

For refrigerators
